title: Congratulating Dennis Metnick upon the occasion of his designation for special recognition for his many years of community involvement
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  congratulating Dennis Metnick upon the occasion
of his designation for special recognition for his many years of  commu-
nity involvement

WHEREAS,  Individuals  who give of their time and energies and serve the
best interests of their communities are an asset beyond remuneration and
cannot be sufficiently extolled; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense  of  this  Legislative  Body  to  acknowledge
outstanding individuals whose professional lives, personal endeavors and
community  service  are  an example and inspiration to their colleagues,
friends, and family; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing  traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to congratu-
late Dennis Metnick upon the occasion of  his  designation  for  special
recognition for his many years of community involvement; this auspicious
occasion  will  be  celebrated by a recognition dinner to be held in his
honor in July of 2010; and
  WHEREAS, The owner of Metnick Law Offices in Margaretville, New  York,
Dennis  Metnick  brings  a  strong  background in business, real estate,
arts, and estate law to his practice of law; he founded his law firm  in
1992; and
  WHEREAS,  Dennis  Metnick has been an active director and performer at
the Shandaken Theatrical Society in Phoenicia, New York; he is also  its
Vice  President  and  a member of the Board of Directors, as well as its
artistic director; and
  WHEREAS, In addition, Dennis Metnick has participated in  performances
for  the  Todd Mountain Project, Schoharie Creek Players, Writers in the
Mountains Ten-Minute Play series, and Bet Am Shalom Theater Project;  he
was  also a stage manager and lighting director for three seasons at the
Belleayre Conservancy Summer concerts; and
  WHEREAS, A distinguished  mentor  who  has  coached  local  teens  and
prepared  them  for academic careers in the theater arts, Dennis Metnick
has also nurtured the creative impulses of dozens  of  local  residents;
and
  WHEREAS,  Dennis  Metnick  has  served  ten years on the Margaretville
Memorial Hospital Board of Directors, including two years as Vice Chair;
he is currently on its Quality Control Committee; and
  WHEREAS, A contributor,  benefactor  and  sponsor  to  numerous  local
community  causes  since 1993, Dennis Metnick has volunteered for myriad
worthy community organizations, including the Fairview  Public  Library,
Belleayre  Conservancy,  Heart  of the Catskills Humane Society, Roxbury
Arts Group and Todd Mountain Theater Project; and
  WHEREAS, Married in 1989 to Amy Moody, Dennis Metnick is the father of
a son, Jason, and daughter, Lisa; he has five grandchildren; and
  WHEREAS, Throughout the entire period of his professional and communi-
ty service, a period of constructive  involvement,  Dennis  Metnick  has
stood  constant  in  dignity,  good  grace and humor, and has earned the
respect and admiration of his colleagues, family and friends; and
  WHEREAS, Rare indeed is the impressive dedication shown by an individ-
ual for the  benefit  of  others  which  Dennis  Metnick  has  displayed
throughout his life; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
congratulate Dennis Metnick upon the occasion  of  his  designation  for
special  recognition for his many years of community involvement; and be
it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Dennis Metnick.
